ygData.subject: Re: The Man (?) Behind the Curtain
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok... I ll join in on the unveiling ...  Linako Lindenlyre, female half-elf bard is in reality.... ...a 42-yr old male, from Oregon.  Currently work as a
ygData.messageBody:
Ok... I'll join in on the "unveiling"... Linako Lindenlyre, female half-elf
bard is in reality....

...a 42-yr old male, from Oregon. Currently work as a controller (i.e.,
glorified bookkeeper) at a country club.

I chose to play a bard not so much for the music, but for the JoAT concept,
since I'm a JOAT in RL. =) My RPG experience goes way back to AD&D back
around 1979 or so (yup, I played a bard then too... Bandimur of Darkmoor,
aka "Bandy the Dandy Bard")


>Since we're "revealing" ourselves ;)
>I'm a 26-year-old male. I play in an international live-action fantasy
>roleplaying club, where I play... Yep - a Bard.
>Like my character, I'm a jack of all trades - playing a variety of
>instruments (though none of them incredibly well) as well as working
>several different jobs.
>I love to do web design and roleplay, and have numerous pages dedicated to
in.
